trans-unit.source: Represents a tab in a <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.Ribbon"></xref>.
You use a RibbonTab to organize related groups of commands in a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.Ribbon>.
The RibbonTab hosts one or more <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonGroup> instances.
A <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonGroup> then hosts controls that represent application commands.
The following list shows the typical hierarchy of elements in a RibbonTab.

- <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.Ribbon> - RibbonTab - <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonGroup> - <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonButton>, <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonRadioButton>, <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonToggleButton>, <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonCheckBox>, <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonTextBox> - <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonComboBox>, <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonMenuButton>, <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonSplitButton> - <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonControlGroup>
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonTab"></xref> class.
Unloads the container for the specified item.
This method undoes the effects of the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonTab.PrepareContainerForItemOverride%2A> method.
The element that is used to display the item.
The item to display from the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl.Items*> collection.
Gets a reference to the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonContextualTabGroup"></xref> that this tab is in.
You use a *contextual tab* to display groups of commands that are relevant only in a particular context.
Contextual tab groups are shown or hidden based on specified criteria.
For example, an Ink Tools tab group might be shown when tablet input is detected, or a Picture Tools tab group might be shown when an Image object is selected.
## Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |Identifier field|| |Metadata properties set to `true`|None|
The contextual tab group that this tab is in; or <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref> if this tab is not in a contextual tab group.
The registered default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
For more information about what can influence the value, see [Dependency Property Value Precedence](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
Gets or sets the header content of the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonContextualTabGroup"></xref> that this tab is in.
## Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |Identifier field|| |Metadata properties set to `true`|None|
The header of the contextual tab group that this tab is in; or <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref> if this tab is not in a contextual tab group.
The registered default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
For more information about what can influence the value, see [Dependency Property Value Precedence](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
Identifies the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonTab.ContextualTabGroupHeader*> dependency property.
To be added.
Identifies the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonTab.ContextualTabGroup*> dependency property.
To be added.
Returns a new <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonGroup"></xref> object.
A new <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonGroup"></xref> container object that is used to display an item from the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl.Items*> collection.
Gets or sets a collection of <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonGroup"></xref> names that specify the order in which group size definitions are applied as the ribbon is reduced in size.
## Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |Identifier field|| |Metadata properties set to `true`|None|

A collection of <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonGroup"></xref> names that specify the order in which group size definitions are applied as the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.Ribbon"></xref> is reduced in size.
The registered default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
For more information about what can influence the value, see [Dependency Property Value Precedence](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
Identifies the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonTab.GroupSizeReductionOrder*> dependency property.
To be added.
Gets a value that indicates whether the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonTab"></xref> supports custom keyboard scrolling.

This property is used to notify the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer> in the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonTab> that keyboard input has been handled the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonTab>.
<xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> in all cases.
Gets or sets the style that is applied to the header of the ribbon tab.
## Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |Identifier field|| |Metadata properties set to `true`|None|
The style that is applied to the header of the ribbon tab.
The registered default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
For more information about what can influence the value, see [Dependency Property Value Precedence](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
Identifies the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonTab.HeaderStyle*> dependency property.
To be added.
Returns a value that indicates whether the specified item is (or is eligible to be) its own container.
The item to test.

<xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the item is a <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonGroup"></xref>; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
Gets or sets a value that indicates whether the ribbon tab is selected.
## Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |Identifier field|| |Metadata properties set to `true`|, , |
<xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if this tab is selected; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
The registered default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
For more information about what can influence the value, see [Dependency Property Value Precedence](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
Identifies the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonTab.IsSelected*> dependency property.
To be added.
Gets or sets the keyboard shortcut for the control.
A KeyTip must be from 1 to 3 uppercase characters, and must not contain spaces, tabs, or newline characters.
KeyTips are sometimes known as access keys or accelerators and are used as shortcut key combinations that activate controls.
KeyTips appear on the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.Ribbon> when you press the ALT key.
## Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |Identifier field|| |Metadata properties set to `true`|None|
The keyboard shortcut for the control.
The registered default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
For more information about what can influence the value, see [Dependency Property Value Precedence](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
Identifies the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonTab.KeyTip*> dependency property.
To be added.
Called when the KeyTip or accelerator key is pressed.
Contains data about the activation.
Creates a new <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.RibbonTabAutomationPeer"></xref> object for this control.
A new automation peer object for this control.
Invoked when the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl.Items*> property changes.
Information about the change.
Provides class handling for the <xref href="System.Windows.UIElement.KeyDown"></xref> routed event.
The event data.
Called when the KeyTip or accelerator key is accessed.
Contains data about the activation.
Raises the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Selector.Selected> attached event.
This method is called when the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonTab.IsSelected%2A> property changes to `true`.
The event data.
Raises the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Selector.Unselected> attached event.
This method is called when the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonTab.IsSelected%2A> property changes to `false`.
The event data.
Prepares the specified element to display the specified item.
The element that is used to display the item.
The item to display from the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl.Items*> collection.
Gets a reference to the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.Ribbon"></xref> that this control belongs to.
This property is set on the parent <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.Ribbon> control and is inherited by the child controls.
It is used to access visual style brushes defined on the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.Ribbon> class.
## Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |Identifier field|| |Metadata properties set to `true`|None|
A reference to the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.Ribbon"></xref> that this control belongs to.
The registered default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
For more information about what can influence the value, see [Dependency Property Value Precedence](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
Identifies the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonTab.Ribbon*> dependency property.
To be added.

Gets a value that indicates the position of the left edge of the corresponding <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonTabHeader"></xref> in the coordinate space of this <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonTab"></xref>.
## Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |Identifier field|| |Metadata properties set to `true`|None|

A value that indicates the position of the left edge of the corresponding <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonTabHeader"></xref> in the coordinate space of this <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonTab"></xref>.
The registered default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
For more information about what can influence the value, see [Dependency Property Value Precedence](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
Identifies the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonTab.TabHeaderLeft*> dependency property.
To be added.

Gets a value that indicates the position of the right edge of the corresponding <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonTabHeader"></xref> in the coordinate space of this <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonTab"></xref>.
## Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |Identifier field|| |Metadata properties set to `true`|None|

A value that indicates the position of the right edge of the corresponding <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonTabHeader"></xref> in the coordinate space of this <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonTab"></xref>.The registered default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
For more information about what can influence the value, see [Dependency Property Value Precedence](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
Identifies the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonTab.TabHeaderRight*> dependency property.
To be added.
